message: I was a big fan of Mike Montiero's "F*ck You, Pay Me" from Creative Mornings SF. He and his lawyer said some things every design professional should know by heart. http://vimeo.com/22053820

Definitely love Mike's message in the video. I mostly recommend anything by Dan Benjamin and 5by5. Actually getting away from uncle Leo's stuff just because I rarely find anything of value besides gossip

I enjoyed that video a lot too. I'd love to see more of the Creative Mornings SF talks (haven't looked for them yet). TED talks are usually very interesting and I also enjoy anything by 37signals (they have a podcast, but there's a lot of other good stuff on YouTube too). Lately I've also really been into the RSAnimate videos on YouTube - definitely worth checking out.

I second 5by5, and the Big Web Show with Zeldman in particular. Dig through those archives... Also, http://boagworld.com is no longer an active show, but it was pretty good for several years. Their archive is worth looking into as well.
Speaking of 5by5, gotta recommend Back To Work with Dan Benjamin and Merlin Mann. http://5by5.tv/b2w Multiple kicks in the ass weekly.

I put in a request to the guys at 5by5 to give us a "best of" gallery of their videos. I want to watch everything after watching the first few shows. Mike_FTW has a regular show on there too from what he's tweeted. Hopefully they give us a list of "most viewed" or "highest rated" soon so we can cut to the best stuff first.
